LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableDoor.label: door
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableDoor.description: A door with a special mechanism that locks the door while there is electricity.
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableWall.label: wall
LanguageData.ElectricUnbreakableWall.description: An electrified wall that prevents it from being hit due to high voltage.
LanguageData.VibraniumWall.label: wall
LanguageData.VibraniumWall.description: Wall of vibranium. Absorbs up to 90% of damage from shots and explosions.
LanguageData.CorrosiumWall.label: wall
LanguageData.CorrosiumWall.description: Wall of Corrosium. Increases Your Maximum Health Over Time.
